attributes.action: Make it statutory that an employee may not request sickness or health details until after taking up employment as it is a discriminatory practice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many employees including local government request health details and sickness record at an interview.  This is a discriminatory practice as it discriminates against those who may have or had an illness. This confidential information should only be asked once a job offer has been given.  Also the habit of asking for a 'medical' before a job offer is allowed because this practice discriminates against those on Incapacity Benefit making it difficult for them to gain employment.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
